biotools.summary: An Abstraction Layer and User Interface for Knowledge Graphs to Support Question Answering | ROBOKOP is a tool for reasoning over structured biomedical knowledge databases as part of the NCATS translator and reasoner programs. The ROBOKOP system consists of a web based user interface, an API server, and several worker servers. The code is separated into three separate repositories
